channel.title: typography on Tiffany Lo
channel.description: Recent content in typography on Tiffany Lo

item.title: Celebrate the Mini Wins in Life
item.description: “Celebrate the Mini Wins in Life!” is a personal mantra that I keep to remain thankful and optimistic despite the demands of everyday life. This poster is a party with vibrant colors, bold typography, and enough confetti to last all night long. Everything was hand-cut and drawn with love and care. It was an extremely time-consuming process. However, it was great fun to return to my papercraft roots and experiment organically throughout the design iterations.

item.title: Archer
item.description: A type specimen to feature Archer’s versatility as a modern, savvy, and approachable typeface. Slab serif fonts aren’t typically go-to options for designers, but this exploration of Archer as body text, title text, and decorative elements demonstrates all of its potential.
